scripts.dev: npm run status && npm run dev --workspace=packages/client & npm run dev --workspace=packages/server
scripts.build: npm run status && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.test: npm run status && npm run test --workspaces
scripts.lint: npm run status && npm run lint --workspaces
scripts.precommit: npm run status && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.push: npm run status && npm run branch:update && git push origin HEAD
scripts.pr: npm run status && gh pr create --web
